description: Tired of /6/crafting with your hands/6/? Need a bigger crafting grid?

/b/Mechanical Crafters/b/ can automate any /6/Shaped Crafting Recipe/6/. Place /6/nine of them in a grid/6/, supply power, and slot in the items. /b/Mechanical Crafters/b/ can be automated by inputting with /b/Hoppers/b/ or /b/Funnels/b/ and placing a depot or belt by the output side.

/b/Mechanical Crafters/b/ can also make /6/grids larger/6/ than normal, allowing them to process /6/Mechanical Crafting recipes/6/, which involve the bigger crafting grid. These work the same as /6/Automated Shaped Crafting/6/, just with more slots.
There are a lot of other quirks and features, give them a /6/ponder/6/ for a more detailed overview.
